package_identity.package_name: Hackney Carriage & Private Hire (Gloucester City Council)
package_identity.package_description: Driver, vehicle and operator licensing for hackney carriage and private hire in Gloucester

pages.title: Driver
pages.audience: Applicants and licensed drivers (Hackney Carriage & Private Hire)

checks_and_clearances.dbs_type: Enhanced (Other Workforce) with Child & Adult Barred Lists
checks_and_clearances.nr3_check: All new and renewal applications checked; refusals/revocations recorded
checks_and_clearances.medical_group_2: Initial certificate ≤3 months old; from 45: every 5 years; from 65: annually

foreign_nationals_or_applicants_resident.certificate_of_good_conduct: From every country lived in >6 months since age 18; certified translation if needed

events_to_notify: Arrest/release, charge or conviction (sexual, dishonesty, violence)
Any conviction, caution, fixed penalty, pending court case
self_reporting_duty.note: Drivers must also inform police of licensed status if arrested/interviewed under caution

conduct_expectations.audio_policy: No loud music; turn off radio on request
conduct_expectations.guide_and_assistance_dogs: Must be carried unless medical exemption

enforcement_and_appeals.penalty_points_system: Totting-up; >12 points in 12 months triggers Sub-Committee review
enforcement_and_appeals.immediate_action: Possible immediate suspension/revocation for public safety
enforcement_and_appeals.appeal_right: 21 days to appeal to Magistrates’ Court (or Crown Court where applicable)

sources: Driver Rule Book & sections on applications, medicals, training, English, self-reporting, NR3, code of conduct ([1](https://gloucester365-my.sharepoint.com/personal/peter_egan_gloucester_gov_uk/Documents/Microsoft%20Copilot%20Chat%20Files/Binder1.pdf))
Common Standards—fit & proper, information sharing, NR3 ([2](https://gloucester365-my.sharepoint.com/personal/peter_egan_gloucester_gov_uk/Documents/Microsoft%20Copilot%20Chat%20Files/Binder1.pdf))

pages.title: Vehicles

hackney_carriage.wheelchair_access: All newly licensed Hackney Carriage vehicles must be wheelchair accessible

age_and_emissions.re_licensing_limit: Not after 15th anniversary of first registration
age_and_emissions.wav_exemption: WAVs exempt from 7-year first licence limit but must be Euro 5+; still limited to 15 years

equipment_and_layout.cctv_dashcam: Permitted with Licensing approval; must comply with data protection
equipment_and_layout.card_machine: Mandatory; provide receipt with time/date, driver number, fare

plates_and_signage.plates: Rear exterior + interior; must be visible
plates_and_signage.roof_sign: Standardised 'TAXI' sign; illuminated when available for hire
plates_and_signage.door_panels: Council recognition panel incl. City crest and plate number; optional business name/phone (max 0.61m²)
plates_and_signage.advertising: Whole-vehicle livery allowed (single product/service) with prior approval

meter_and_tariff.meter_inspection: Required; set to current tariff; visible to hirer

temporary_replacement_vehicle.process: Application with V5/insurance/MOT/inspection/meter cert + fee; ‘T’ plate issued

private_hire.signage_and_door_panels: Approved yellow panels stating company name, 'Private Hire', and 'Pre-Bookings Only'; no 'taxi' or 'cab' wording

equipment_and_layout.cctv_dashcam: Permitted with approval; must comply with data protection

age_emissions_testing.first_licence: ≤7 years old and Euro 6 (WAVs Euro 5+ exempt from 7-year rule)
age_emissions_testing.re_licensing_limit: Not after 15th anniversary of first registration

pages.vehicle_proprietor_criminality_check: Annual Basic DBS (unless also licensed as a driver with Gloucester City Council)

pages.title: Operators
pages.audience: Private Hire Operators (companies and sole traders)

licensing.operator_base: Must be within Gloucester City boundaries

dbs_and_staff.operator_dbs: Annual Basic DBS if not also a licensed driver
dbs_and_staff.booking_and_dispatch_staff_dbs: Basic DBS (operator must define frequency and policies; common standard is every 3 years)
dbs_and_staff.ex_offenders_policy: Operator must have written policy on employing ex-offenders and on the timing of re-checks
dbs_and_staff.outsourced_booking_dispatch: Operator must ensure third-party provider meets DBS and policy requirements

mandatory_fields_per_booking: Name of person taking the booking
Name of person dispatching the vehicle
record_keeping.retention_minimum: At least 6 months from last entry
record_keeping.availability: Records must be produced to Council officers or police on request
record_keeping.vehicles_and_drivers_records: Keep details of vehicles operated (owner, reg/plate) and drivers (name/badge)

charging_and_booking.sub_contracting: Permitted to other licensed operators under Deregulation Act 2015

enforcement_and_appeals.penalty_points_and_sanctions: Warnings, suspension, revocation, prosecution depending on severity/history
enforcement_and_appeals.appeal_right: 21 days to appeal to Magistrates’ Court (except immediate vehicle suspension under s68)

sources: Common Standards: operator licence duration; booking/dispatch staff DBs; record-keeping list; outsourcing ([2](https://gloucester365-my.sharepoint.com/personal/peter_egan_gloucester_gov_uk/Documents/Microsoft%20Copilot%20Chat%20Files/Binder1.pdf))

Private Hire Rule Book: records retention, operator base, advertising restrictions, production of records ([2](https://gloucester365-my.sharepoint.com/personal/peter_egan_gloucester_gov_uk/Documents/Microsoft%20Copilot%20Chat%20Files/Binder1.pdf))

pages.title: Passengers
pages.audience: People using hackney carriage and private hire services

your_rights_and_safety.guide_and_assistance_dogs: Drivers must carry assistance dogs (no extra charge) unless medically exempt
your_rights_and_safety.smokefree_vehicles: All licensed vehicles are smokefree at all times, including e-cigarettes/vaping; ‘No Smoking’ signs required
your_rights_and_safety.seatbelts: All passengers must wear seatbelts; drivers are responsible for passengers under 14

fares_and_meters.hackney_carriage_in_district: Fare must not exceed the meter; meter and tariff card must be visible
fares_and_meters.out_of_district_or_private_hire: Fare/method of calculation must be agreed in advance
fares_and_meters.card_payments: Contactless/card payment available in all licensed vehicles; receipts available on request

accessibility_in_hackney_carriages.wheelchair_access: All newly licensed hackney carriages are wheelchair accessible
accessibility_in_hackney_carriages.minimum_standards: Ramps with locking/stowage; anchorages for wheelchair and occupant; grab handles; doorway ≥75cm; doorway height ≥1.2m; compartment height ≥1.3m; non-slip treads

complaints_and_lost_property.complaints_how_to: Vehicles must display how to complain (Council contact, plate number, website). Complaints are recorded and investigated; serious cases may be referred to police.
complaints_and_lost_property.lost_property: Drivers must check after each journey. Unclaimed items after 48 hours should be handed to the Council or police with a receipt.

safety_and_enforcement.vehicle_checks: Annual inspection (every 6 months for vehicles ≥8 years)
safety_and_enforcement.required_equipment: Fire extinguisher (BSEN3, 1kg powder) and HSE-compliant first aid kit
safety_and_enforcement.cctv: Some vehicles may have approved CCTV/dashcams compliant with data protection

sources: Passenger rights on assistance dogs, smokefree, seatbelts, fares/meters, complaints signage, lost property ([4](https://gloucester365-my.sharepoint.com/personal/peter_egan_gloucester_gov_uk/Documents/Microsoft%20Copilot%20Chat%20Files/Binder1.pdf))

legislation: Police and Criminal Evidence Act 1984 (PACE) – interviews under caution
DfT Statutory Taxi and Private Hire Vehicle Standards (July 2020)
strategy: Corporate Plan 2025–28: Work with operators to increase the number of zero-emission hackney carriage and private hire vehicles; retain Purple Flag; safer spaces work, especially for women and girls
policy: Hackney Carriage & Private Hire Regulatory Guidelines (Approved September 2021)
Common Standards for Licensing Hackney Carriage and Private Hire in Gloucestershire (based on DfT standards)
operational_guidance: Enforcement & Complaints Policy/Procedure; penalty points scheme; immediate suspension/revocation process
Approved testing stations list (2024) and Licensing Authority Vehicle Test Certificate requirements
NR3 (National Register of Taxi Licence Refusals and Revocations) use for checks and recording
Record-keeping requirements for operators (mandatory booking fields; 6+ months retention)
value: Ensure access to efficient, effective public transport
Improve standards and visibility in support of city regeneration
quality: Six-monthly Enhanced DBS checks for drivers (Update Service)
Vehicle inspections annually (and every 6 months after 8 years)
Operator booking records: mandatory fields & minimum retention
Time-based expectations: driver self-reporting within 48 hours; accident notification within 72 hours; renewal submissions before expiry
consistency: Adopted common standards across Gloucestershire authorities
Joint authorisation of enforcement officers; information-sharing agreements
Use of NR3 to check refusals/revocations nationally
accountability: Table of Delegations: Licensing Officers, Licensing & Enforcement Sub-Committee, and Full Committee responsibilities
Right of appeal to Magistrates’ (or Crown) Court within 21 days
